Package pt.isel.leic.svlc.kubernetes

Class Kubernetes

java.lang.Object
pt.isel.leic.svlc.kubernetes.Kubernetes
public class Kubernetes extends Object
Represents a class that handles the Kubernetes API.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Kubernetes()
    Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the default master URL and namespace.
    Kubernetes(String masterUrl, String namespace)
    Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the specified master URL and namespace.

  • Constructor Details

    • Kubernetes

      public Kubernetes()
      Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the default master URL and namespace.

    • Kubernetes

      public Kubernetes(String masterUrl, String namespace) throws Exception
      Constructs a Kubernetes instance with the specified master URL and namespace.
      Parameters:
      masterUrl - The URL of the Kubernetes cluster.
      namespace - The namespace to use in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the Kubernetes token cannot be retrieved.

  • Method Details

    • listPods

      public List<io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Pod> listPods()
      Lists all the pods in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Returns:
      A list of all the pods in the Kubernetes cluster.

    • listDeployments

      public io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.apps.DeploymentList listDeployments()
      Lists all the deployments in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Returns:
      A list of all the deployments in the Kubernetes cluster.

    • listServices

      public io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.ServiceList listServices()
      Lists all the services in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Returns:
      A list of all the services in the Kubernetes cluster.

    • scaleDeployment

      public void scaleDeployment(String deploymentName, int replicas)
      Scales a deployment to the specified number of replicas.
      Parameters:
      deploymentName - The name of the deployment to scale.
      replicas - The number of replicas to scale to.

    • getPodLogs

      public String getPodLogs(String podName)
      Gets the logs of a pod with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      podName - The name of the pod to get logs from.
      Returns:
      The logs of the pod.

    • enableAutoscaling

      public void enableAutoscaling(String deploymentName, int minPods, int maxPods, int targetCPUUtilizationPercentage)
      Enables autoscaling for a deployment with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      deploymentName - The name of the deployment to enable autoscaling for.
      minPods - The minimum number of pods to scale to.
      maxPods - The maximum number of pods to scale to.
      targetCPUUtilizationPercentage - The target CPU utilization percentage.

    • getNodeStates

      public Map<String,Map<String,String>> getNodeStates()
      Gets the status of all the nodes in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Returns:
      A map containing the status of all the nodes in the Kubernetes cluster.

    • getNodeState

      public Map<String,String> getNodeState(String nodeName)
      Gets the status of one node in the Kubernetes cluster.
      Returns:
      A map containing the status of the specified node in the Kubernetes cluster or null if the node is not found.

    • deployFromYaml

      public String deployFromYaml(String yaml)
      Deploys a Kubernetes resource from a YAML string. The YAML string can contain multiple resources separated by "\n---\n".
      Parameters:
      yaml - The YAML string to deploy.
      Returns:
      The Kubernetes resource that was deployed.
